resources.string: SnipBack is loaded with over 40+ features,\nbut one of the most innovative features is the \nability to record into the PAST.

Whether it’s going back and adding missed
 footage from the beginning of an event, or 
 just waiting for the action to happen first 
and then using our exclusive QuickBack 
feature to go back and get it, SnipBack has
 you covered.
Tap Button or \nSwipe Left on screen.

After capturing some great video, our 
patented editor, with its simple “set begin set 
end” method, makes creating highlight reels
 ridiculously simple. You can seamlessly 
extract unwanted segments, specify highlight 
zones, and even apply slow-mo/speed-up
 effects…all easier than ever before.
Leveraging our exclusive SnipBack \ntechnology, taking perfect photos has never\n been easier.

Our SnapBack Photos feature essentially 
enables you to take pictures in the past. And 
it’s really simple…just hold up your camera, 
make your poses, then tap our SnapBack 
button.
SnipBack will then let you scan the last 10 \nseconds for the best pics!
Tap Button or \nSwipe Right on screen.
Great overview video covering \nQuickBack, QuickBack+, On-the-Fly \nTagging, and SnapBack Photos.
Great overview video covering \nQuickBack, QuickBack+, On-the-Fly \nTagging, and SnapBack Photos.

How to use our QuickBack feature to 
capture great highlights, and then 
easily merge them together to create 
a great highlight video.
Use QuickBack+ to capture exactly \nwhat you want, nothing more, nothing \nless.

Use our On-the-Fly tagging to add 
tags, including audio tags that can 
play before/after your video. Plus, how
 to extend QuickBacks.

Use SnapBack Photos to easily 
capture the best pics. This video 
shows you how to use this feature to 
capture the best selfies.
Tap Button or \nSwipe Right on screen.
Tap Button or \nSwipe Right on screen.

● Highlight Reel Creator
● Cut Zone - Cut Out Unwanted Video
● Add SlowMo & SpeedUp Zones
● All Future Features Included
● No Ads
● Crop Video for Social Media \n● Add Background Music \n● Add Voiceover

● REGULAR UPDATES
● ACCESS FUTURE FEATURES
● SPECIAL INCENTIVES
● ACCESS PROMOTIONS
● FREE GIVEAWAYS
● STAY INFORMED

Remember, If you tap on "'"Save 
the video"'" button, the ORIGINAL video will 
overwrite with this. You can save it as a 
new video, tap "'"Save As "'"

resources.string: This sample needs permission for camera and audio recording.
This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
This app needs permission to use this feature. You can grant them in app settings.
